name: x402-protocol
description: Agent demonstration of using x402 payments protocol to access IQ AI's ATP

scripts.build: cd server && pnpm run build && cd ../agent && pnpm run build
scripts.start: concurrently "cd server && pnpm run start" "cd agent && pnpm run start"
scripts.postinstall: cd server && pnpm install && cd ../agent && pnpm install

author: IQAICOM
